entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 05:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
